plot: Compilation feature of silent-era shorts and newsreels, including Harry Langdon's "Saturday Afternoon," Charlie Chaplin's "Easy Street" and Buster Keaton's "Cops."
title: Nickelodeon Days
plot_es: Compilation feature of silent-era shorts and newsreels, including Harry Langdon's "Saturday Afternoon," Charlie Chaplin's "Easy Street" and Buster Keaton's "Cops."
